---
title: "Getting Started with R"
---

This site is about getting started with the [R](https://www.r-project.org) programming language. It aims to..

+ Help you install and setup the software required to start using R.
+ Introduces the [RStudio](https://posit.co/downloads/) Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for writing R code.
+ Explains some basic concepts about R packages and environments.
+ Introduces the Tidyverse.
+ Shows some basic examples of loading some data, cleaning it and summarising it via plots and tables.

This is site written in [Quarto](https://quarto.org) by [slackline](https://github.com/slackline). If you find any
problems with the content please [create an issue](https://github.com/slackline/getting-started-with-r/issues).
